title: Black Jaguar, Green Jade
description: An adventure story set in the jungles of Belize and introducing the heroine, Maya, who realizes her dream of joining an archaeological dig and deciphering mysterious glyphs. But she must also confront drug dealers, kidnappers, and her feelings for Balam, a young man from a nearby village. With the help of her friends, both real and imaginary, she solves an ancient puzzle and helps the animals she loves. An adventure that superimposes young adult culture over an ancient civilization with fascinating reslults.
author: Sylvia L. Andrews
